asgn1Election

Class PrefElection

  • java.lang.Object
    • asgn1Election.Election
      • asgn1Election.PrefElection

  • public class PrefElection
extends Election
    Subclass of Election, specialised to preferential, but not optional preferential voting.
    Author:
    hogan
